title: FIGHT: BODY HITS SFX PACK1
description: A meticulously created realistic foley pack for punches, kicks and smacks.
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


The “FIGHT: BODY HITS SFX PACK1” is a high-quality collection of foley sound effects designed to bring visceral realism to your game’s combat scenes. Whether it’s a bone-crunching punch, a thunderous kick, or a resounding smack, this pack delivers the impact your players crave.


Key Features:


High-Quality Audio Specs: Each sound effect is available in three audio specifications: 96kHz/24-bit, 48kHz/24-bit, and 44.1kHz/24-bit. This flexibility ensures seamless integration into your game, regardless of your project’s audio requirements.


Use Cases:


Action Games: Enhance the combat experience in action-packed games, whether it’s a gritty street fight or an intergalactic battle.

Fighting Simulators: Create authentic fighting simulators where players can feel every impact.

Cinematic Trailers: Elevate your game’s promotional material with spine-tingling sound effects that leave a lasting impression.
technicalDetails:
TOTAL SOUNDS:275

{275 in each audio specification}


Number of Audio Waves: 275+275+275

Number of Audio Cues: 275+275+275

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1kHz/24bit + 48kHz/24bit + 96kHz/24bit

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
v1
275 variations of body hits to emulate sounds such as punches, kicks, smacks
